resources.string: On some custom ICS images the permission on /dev/tun might be wrong, or the tun module might be missing completely. For CM9 images try the fix ownership option under general settings
Failed to open the tun interface
Got interface information %1$s and %2$s, assuming second address is peer address of remote. Using /32 netmask for local IP. Mode given by OpenVPN is \"%3$s\".
Cannot make sense of %1$s and %2$s as IP route with CIDR netmask, using /32 as netmask.
Your image does not support the VPNService API, sorry :(
Refusing to open tun device without IP information
Error signing with Android keystore key %1$s: %2$s

No DNS servers being used. Name resolution may not work. Consider setting custom DNS Servers. Please also note that Android will keep using your proxy settings specified for your mobile/Wi-Fi connection when no DNS servers are set.
Could not add DNS Server \"%1$s\", rejected by the system: %2$s
Could not configure IP Address \"%1$s\", rejected by the system: %2$s
OpenVPN crashed unexpectedly. Please consider using the send Minidump option in the main menu
Pausing connection in screen off state: less than %1$s in %2$ss
Multiple VPNs found in your Shellfire Account. Please choose which one to use.
In case multiple VPNs are present, you don\'t have to select the VPN at each log in.
Displaying the log permanently can lead to performance loss (requires restarting the app).
Connects to the selected server. To change servers, swipe to the right.
Premium Upgrade successful. Display Server list?
Already on this server - doing nothing
Server not available to you. \nWould you like to see upgrade informations?
You are currently connected. You have to disconnect prior to the server change. Disconnect now?
Are you sure you want to change servers?
Server is being changed. This can take a moment...
Server could not be changed. Please check the log for details.
Connection is being processed - please wait

No and do not show again
Please enter a valid email address.
A registered account for that e-mail address already exists.

Hi and welcome to the free Shellfire VPN service!
You have been automatically registered with your Google email-address %1$s.
Your account is currently bound to your device. If you want to login with another device (e.g. other tablet or smartphone) and the same account, you should set a password.
Click on this link to set a password: https://www.shellfire.net/passwort-verloren/?pwReqByCustNoFormSent=1&LoginName=%2$s
You can access our free servers in Germany and the USA with up to 786 kbit/sec. With our premium packages, you get unlimited speed and access to servers in 19 countries world-wide. Take a look at the tab \"serverlist\" in the app for the full list of available countries.
Premium packages start from 99 Cent for a 24 hour pass (see the tab \"premium\").
If you have questions, please contact us at https://www.shellfire.net/kontakt/
That\'s is for now - enjoy our great free service!

Best regards from the Shellfire team

Shellfire VPN - easy. safe. connected. No registration.
Shellfire VPN is FREE and will never cost you a dime. Unlimited Traffic, Unlimited Time!
Shellfire VPN hides your IP address, unblocks the Internet and gives you the ability to freely and anonymously access any site you want. With Shellfire VPN, you can connect to any website with the confidence knowing that you are undercover. We unblock Skype, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube etc. in countries with Internet censorship and even give you access your home country\'s TV and radio services from abroad.
Shellfire VPN gives you super strong encryption to protect your data from hackers, the NSA and other threats, even in unsecure public wifi networks!
Upgrade to Premium to get - Higher Speed. - Stronger Encryption. - Free choice from our servers in: Austria, Canada, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Romania, Russia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom and USA - PremiumPlus customers get exclusive access to servers in: Chile, Iceland, Isle of Man (offshore) and Liechtenstein
Shellfire VPN - the ultimate VPN client for Android.
Shellfire VPN also runs on Windows, Mac OS, iOS or Linux! Visit https://www.shellfire.net/vpn/ for more details.
For instant updates do follow us in Facebook & Twitter https://www.facebook.com/shellfire.de https://twitter.com/shellfire_en
